epoch.note: Counts based on variable 'epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/erg/orb/lpre/l2/2018/erg_orb_lpre_l2_20180101_v01.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 100.0000% of the 1440 timesteps. Cadence = 60000000000 [ns] = PT1M.

Counts based on variable 'epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/erg/orb/lpre/l2/2027/erg_orb_lpre_l2_20271231_v02.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 100.0000% of the 1440 timesteps. Cadence = 60000000000 [ns] = PT1M.
